detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-aspect-ratio-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-aspect-ratio-video';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-breadcrumb-custom-separator';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-breadcrumb-customized';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-click-outside-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Cropper, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const CropperShape = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid gutter="md">      
      <Grid.Item xs="6">        
        <Cropper shape="rectangle" aspectRatio="2" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="6">        
        <Grid gutter="md">          
          <Grid.Item xs="12">            
            <Cropper shape="square" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>            
          </Grid.Item>          
          <Grid.Item xs="12">            
            <Cropper shape="circle" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>            
          </Grid.Item>          
        </Grid>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default CropperShape;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-shape';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Cropper, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const CropperStyles = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid gutter="md">      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="5">        
        <Cropper className="style-1" indicator mode="crop" shape="circle" resizer="main" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/penguin.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="7">        
        <Cropper className="style-2" indicator mode="crop" resizer="both" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/penguin.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="6">        
        <Cropper className="style-3" guides indicator mode="crop" resizer="main" resizerShape="circle" shape="circle" src="/assets/images/cat.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="6">        
        <Cropper className="style-4" guides mode="crop" resizer="edge" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/cat.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="7">        
        <Cropper className="style-5" backdrop background mode="crop" resizer="edge" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/ladybug.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="5">        
        <Cropper className="style-6" src="/assets/images/bear.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default CropperStyles;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-styles';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-backdrop';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-full-width';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-nesting';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-prevent';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-dialog-prevent';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-dialog-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-specific-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-vertical';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.script:
import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const DrawerDefault = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid>      
      <Grid.Item xs="auto">        
        <Drawer animation="fade" size="200px" connector="drawer-default">          
          <Card>
            Drawer Content
          </Card>          
        </Drawer>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="grow">        
        <Card>          
          <Drawer.Toggler connector="drawer-default">
            Toggle
          </Drawer.Toggler>          
        </Card>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default DrawerDefault;

import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const DrawerDefault = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid>      
      <Grid.Item xs="auto">        
        <Drawer animation="fade" size="200px" connector="drawer-default">          
          <Card>
            Drawer Content
          </Card>          
        </Drawer>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="grow">        
        <Card>          
          <Drawer.Toggler connector="drawer-default">
            Toggle
          </Drawer.Toggler>          
        </Card>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default DrawerDefault;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-align-content';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-align-self';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-gutter-x';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-hide';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-offset';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-reverse';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-icon-rotate';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-intersection-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-portal-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-portal-strategy';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-scroll-indicator-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>

      </Grid.Item>

      </Grid.Item>

  </>;
};

export default SpinnerColor;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-spinner-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react";

const SpinnerType = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="default"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="double-bounce"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ripple"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="dual-ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="square"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default SpinnerType;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-spinner-type';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-spinner-type';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        anchor.download = 'react-dedicated-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-top';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-switch-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-below';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-justify';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-separate';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-vertical';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react";

const TooltipArrows = () => {
  return <>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Default
      <Tooltip>        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Round
      <Tooltip arrow="round">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Large

    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Small
      <Tooltip placement="top" arrow="small">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Wide

    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Narrow

    </button>    
  </>;
};

export default TooltipArrows;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tooltip-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tooltip-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.script:
import { Grid, Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react";

const TooltipTrigger = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Hover
          <Tooltip trigger="hover">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Focus
          <Tooltip trigger="focus">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Click
          <Tooltip trigger="click">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default TooltipTrigger;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-transition-name';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
